message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you want a fair deal Alice, but this will benefit us both in the long run. Think about it - you lose 20% per round, while I only lose 5%. Let's make a deal now.
Bob, my offer is still the fairest. I'm losing money faster, we need to settle this soon.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable, but your offers are getting worse for you!  This is my final offer, take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Bob, time is running out.  This is a compromise, take it before we both lose even more!
